评论详情: The quality you get with this shirt for $15 is insane. Better than some shirts I've paid $40 plus for.
Very good quality and looks nice
Great style and quality, also very comfy.
Looks great and is super comfortable. Good quality material, unique looking. Great for a "streetwear" type shirt. Love it, and it goes with a lot of different outfits.
his is a thicker well made t shirt. The design is great. It looks amazing with a pair of jeans dressed up or down

My child absolutely loves stars and this shirt did not disappoint.  The Tshirt quality was stellar and thick, yet cool on the body. I could tell that the fabric was of good quality just off of appearance alone. I thought the frayed jean would be a great way to make her favorite jeans pop. Definitely cute and different.

So this is a very "durable" shirt....the fabric is thick and stiff-It feels more like 100% Cotton instead of 95% and 5% Spandex, it feels like a T-shirt from when I was a kid. So as most of us know, a shirt like this will soften up after multiple washes, so that’s no big deal for me personally...The neck is very small, which is uncomfortable for me. The writing on the back of this shirt is weird. I don't even KNOW what that first word says...it looks like "Farchard"?!?! I'm also not so sure about the front writing either. It seems more appropriate for someone in support of someone with a major medical issue, or something of the sort. It doesn't seem like a shirt you would just wear for no reason I.M.O.  Overall, I’m personally not a fan of this shirt, and wish I had asked my Daughter a few more questions before letting her get this LOL but it will be a GREAT hair dying shirt for me since the neck is so tight!  I hope My Review has been Helpful!! 😊👍
